name: Reverse the Curse
description:
Made for the Duality Game Jam 2021.

Barbra is a ghost exorcists. She need your help toward off the ghost long enough to complete the job. Help Barbra Maintain the shrines as long as possible, while also helping her meditation to clear out the harmful ghosts.

Two separate games played simultaneously on the same computer. Good for two players, or a challenging experience for two players.

Left Screen: Ward off ghost as long as you can, by placing candles at the mirrors.

-WASD to move.

Right Screen: Tile matching game.  Making matches creates buffs and debuffs for Barbra to deal with..

-Use the mouse to drag and interact with tiles.
